sample.title: Custom Build Language
sample.para: This sample demonstrates how to add some custom elements to the build DSL.

The build is composed of 2 types of projects. The first type of project represents a product. The second type represents a product module. Each product includes one or more product modules, and each product module may be included in multiple products. That is, there is a many-to-many relationship between these products and product modules.

section.title: How the build is organised
section.para: The build scripts of each project contain a very small number of declarative elements. The bulk of the work is done by 2 custom plugins found in buildSrc/src/main/groovy.
